MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML10 postcode area of Strathaven. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1.58pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further repairs required to an underground cable fault on Newton road and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:05PM on Wednesday 27 January 2021.
